shoes.name: Air Max 270
shoes.description: Experience ultimate comfort with Nike's iconic Air Max 270, featuring the tallest Air unit yet for all-day cushioning. Perfect for casual wear with a bold, statement-making design.

shoes.name: Air Force 1
shoes.description: The classic white-on-white Nike Air Force 1 revolutionized basketball footwear and streetwear culture. Timeless style meets durable leather construction.

shoes.name: Nike Dunk Low
shoes.description: Originally designed for the hardwood, the Dunk Low returns with classic colors and throwback hoops flair. Premium leather offers durability and comfort.

shoes.name: Nike Pegasus 39
shoes.description: A workhorse with wings, the Pegasus 39 offers responsive cushioning for your daily runs. Updated midsole foam provides softer landings and explosive takeoffs.

shoes.name: Nike React Infinity
shoes.description: Designed to help reduce injury and keep you running, the React Infinity features plush cushioning and a wide platform for stability on long distances.

shoes.name: Ultraboost 22
shoes.description: Adidas Ultraboost 22 combines responsive Boost cushioning with a Primeknit+ upper that adapts to your foot's shape for a precision fit.

shoes.name: Adidas Superstar
shoes.description: The iconic shell-toe design that became a hip-hop legend. The Superstar features a durable leather upper and classic serrated 3-Stripes.

shoes.name: NMD_R1
shoes.description: The NMD_R1 combines retro running style with modern comfort. Features responsive Boost cushioning and signature color-blocked plugs.

shoes.name: Adizero Boston 10
shoes.description: A lightweight speed trainer with energy-returning Boost cushioning. The Boston 10 helps you maintain pace from warmup to cooldown.

shoes.name: Forum Low
shoes.description: The basketball icon returns with its signature oversized straps and bold attitude. Premium leather upper offers classic style and durability.

shoes.name: Chuck Taylor All Star
shoes.description: The original basketball shoe that became a cultural canvas. Classic canvas upper with rubber toe cap and iconic star ankle patch.

shoes.name: Run Star Hike
shoes.description: Chunky platform meets classic Converse style. The Run Star Hike features a dramatic lugged sole for bold streetwear statements.

shoes.name: Chuck 70
shoes.description: Premium version of the original with higher-quality materials, better cushioning, and improved durability. The definitive Chuck Taylor experience.

shoes.name: One Star
shoes.description: The skateboarding classic with a suede upper and signature lone star logo. Low-profile cushioning provides boardfeel and comfort.

shoes.name: Weapon CX
shoes.description: Modern update of the 80s basketball icon with CX foam cushioning for all-day comfort. Premium materials with vintage styling details.

shoes.name: Classic Clog
shoes.description: The original comfort clog with Croslite™ material for lightweight cushioning. Ventilation ports add breathability and help wash away debris.

shoes.name: Echo Clog
shoes.description: Next-gen comfort with a sleeker silhouette. LiteRide™ foam provides cloud-like cushioning while maintaining Crocs' signature comfort.

shoes.name: Classic All-Terrain
shoes.description: Rugged version of the Classic Clog with enhanced traction and sport-inspired details. Perfect for outdoor adventures while maintaining comfort.

shoes.name: LiteRide Clog
shoes.description: Ultra-lightweight clog with innovative LiteRide™ foam that's 25% lighter than traditional Croslite™ material. Next-level comfort technology.

shoes.name: Classic Crush
shoes.description: The Classic Clog gets a stylish makeover with crushed pearlized finishes. All the comfort with elevated, shimmering style.

shoes.name: Gel-Kayano 30
shoes.description: Premium stability running shoe with FF BLAST™ PLUS cushioning. The Kayano 30 offers plush comfort with reliable support for overpronators.

shoes.name: GT-2000 11
shoes.description: Reliable guidance for neutral runners. The GT-2000 11 features dynamic support and responsive cushioning for smooth transitions.

shoes.name: Gel-Nimbus 25
shoes.description: Maximum cushioning meets premium comfort. The Nimbus 25 features FF BLAST™ PLUS ECO cushioning for soft landings and energetic toe-offs.

shoes.name: Novablast 3
shoes.description: Energetic daily trainer with FF BLAST™ PLUS cushioning. The Novablast 3 offers a bouncy ride with a rocker shape for smooth transitions.

shoes.name: Magic Speed 2
shoes.description: Lightweight speed trainer with carbon-infused plate. The Magic Speed 2 helps propel you forward for tempo runs and race day.

cart.name: Chuck Taylor All Star
cart.description: The original basketball shoe that became a cultural canvas. Classic canvas upper with rubber toe cap and iconic star ankle patch.

cart.name: Forum Low
cart.description: The basketball icon returns with its signature oversized straps and bold attitude. Premium leather upper offers classic style and durability.

cart.name: Adidas Superstar
cart.description: The iconic shell-toe design that became a hip-hop legend. The Superstar features a durable leather upper and classic serrated 3-Stripes.
